mapper.sql: select count(*) from STEAM s JOIN MEMBER m ON s.MEM_NUM = m.MEM_NUM where m.MEM_STATUS in ('N', 'S') and s.steam_flag='Y'
mapper.select: and s.goods_num=#{ goodsNum } and s.mem_num=#{ memNum }
mapper.insert: insert into steam(GOODS_NUM, MEM_NUM, STEAM_FLAG, INPUT_DATE) values( #{ goodsNum }, #{ memNum }, 'Y', sysdate)
mapper.select: select v.MEM_NUM_SELL, v.GOODS_NUM, v.IMG_NAME, v.PRICE_FM, m.NICK, m.IMG from V_SELECT_ALL_GOODS v join member m on v.MEM_NUM_SELL=m.MEM_NUM where v.mem_num_sell=#{ memNum } and v.GOODS_NUM not in( #{ goodsNum } )
SELECT * FROM V_SELECT_REVIEW_STAR WHERE GOODS_NUM IN ( SELECT GOODS_NUM FROM GOODS WHERE MEM_NUM_SELL = 5 )
